settings.platform_help: Select the AI platform to use.
settings.max_tokens_help: What are tokens and how to count them?
settings.temperature_help: Controls the randomness. The range is usually between 0 and 2 but some platforms have other ranges.
settings.user_prompt_help: Enter the user id that will be used to generate AI responses.
settings.system_prompt_help: Provide context and instructions to the Assistant, such as specifying a particular goal or role.
settings.system_prompt_placeholder: You are a helpful assistant on a Flarum forum.
settings.user_prompt_badge_help: Text that will be displayed below the assistant user.
settings.enable_on_discussion_started_help: When enabled, AI replies only at discussion start. When disabled, the discussion becomes a chat between the OP and the assistant; the assistant replies to every OP post.
settings.enabled_tags_help: Select in which tags the assistant will generate responses.
